data.text: For narrower, I love my Teravail Cannonballs at 700x42. I also run 27.5x2.4 WTB Riddlers that I‚Äôm really happy with, though when they wear out I may look at something a little less knobby for mixed terrain. The Riddlers don‚Äôt feel too sluggish on pavement, but I‚Äôm curious if something else would roll easier for rides to the trailhead.
